Author: wcxofficial
Title: [ANN][ICO] WCX – Digital currency exchange built by ex Apple engineers
Body: Thanks again for your replies and questions. Please see our answers below.  Our previous answer wikis, where we answer frequently asked questions, are available here:  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2026078.msg20340135#msg20340135 https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2026078.msg20362180#msg20362180   How long will the referral program be active for?  It'll likely be active till the Beta launch in early September. The rewards will decrease over time. The sign up bonus promotion is likely to decrease from 100 WCX to 50 WCX in the next 24 hours, and the referrals will decrease from 200 WCX to 100 WCX per friend.  Added QTUM, WINGS, STORJ, MINEREUM, STEEM, ANT, BYTE, XZT, BCC to the Coin voting form.  You can find a list of coins we’re considering here: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdkFM1HKmTfhDeJ5Acn5hstJFi_Mcj8KIgMk7fpvOxJ2Ua5aA/viewform. You can suggest other coins to add by replying in this thread.  How will the revenue sharing process work with WCX tokens?  Payments will be made to your WCX wallet. You'll be getting paid in all sorts of digital currencies, since WCX collects fees in many different digital currencies. If your WCX tokens are held outside of WCX itself, you'll be able to provide an ETH address on your account that we'll monitor when making payments to you.  How does the referral system count referrals?  Referred users need to verify their email for them to count.  I'm getting an “Account already in use.” error when trying to sign up at https://wcex.co.  This means your IP has already been used. It’s one registration per IP.  Is there a minimum of WCX needed to receive revenue share payments?  Yes, although this hasn't yet been determined. It'll be low - the measure is simply taken to avoid blockchain spam.  Plans to list on other exchanges outside of WCX?  Not at this time. Liquidity to buy or sell will be available on WCX for WCX tokens at launch time.  How to participate in the Beta launch?  We'll be looking for beta users. This will be communicated in this thread, on Twitter (@wcxofficial), and by email (the one you used to register at https://wcex.co).  Will you support BCC?  We'll support all coins with enough interest from the public, measured mainly through voting/polling.

Body: In order to be successful, WCX must have unique and attractive features, which will help to gain more users. Without generating huge volume, there would be no different among all the other small exchanges. I agreed, an exchange without huge volume can't be successful. Without generating huge volume, there would be no different among all the other small exchanges. I agreed, an exchange without huge volume can't be successful. Thus, I hope WCX team will bring to us some good features that other exchanges don't have.  Considerably lower fees, awesome customer support, and radically better user experience. This is in addition to the unique revenue sharing structure that's available through WCX tokens through which you receive part of the exchange fee revenue if you hold WCX tokens.

Author: wcxofficial
Title: [ANN][ICO] WCX – Digital currency exchange built by ex Apple engineers
Body: Thanks again for your replies and questions. Please find our answers below.  (Here's a link to our previous answer wiki: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2026078.msg20340135#msg20340135)  I can't wait to read the whitepaper. When it will be available?  This will become available within the next couple of weeks. More information about the ICO fund distribution, team, etc. will also be made available.  What currencies can be used to purchase WCX tokens during the ICO?  BTC and ETH. If there's enough interest we can accommodate for other currencies as well.  Are there deposit or withdrawal limits?  No.  Will you have a chatbox?  Yes.  Is it a decentralized exchange?  No, not at first. Decentralization of user wallets is on our roadmap for 2018.  How will you compete with incumbent exchanges?  Considerably lower fees, awesome customer service, and radically better user experience.  What will happen after the ICO with unsold tokens?  Unsold tokens will be burned.  If you invite more than 250 people using the referral system at https://wcex.co, will they be counted?  Yes. There is no limit to how many people you can invite. 250 is the max shown on the progress bar, but your balance will keep increasing if you refer more.  Where will WCX tokens be traded?  They will be traded on WCX with bases BTC, ETH, and USDT.  Can we withdraw the WCX tokens from our account?  Not yet. WCX token is an ERC20 token so you'll be able to withdraw it to your Ethereum wallet.  How will the commissions be paid to WCX token holders if they're held in an Ethereum wallet?  Payments will be made to your WCX wallet. You'll be getting paid in all sorts of digital currencies, since WCX collects fees in many different digital currencies. If your WCX tokens are held outside of WCX itself, you'll be able to provide an ETH address on your account that we'll monitor when making payments to you.  Will you offer derivatives at launch time?  No. Margin trading is on the roadmap for 2018.  Please add BNT, OMG, MYST, TAAS, PLBT.  These have been added to the voting form here: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdkFM1HKmTfhDeJ5Acn5hstJFi_Mcj8KIgMk7fpvOxJ2Ua5aA/viewform?usp=sf_link  Please let us know by replying in this thread if there are coins you'd like to trade that are not listed on the voting form.  Do WCX tokens give me voting rights concerning decisions made for the exchange?  Decisions on which coins and markets to add next will be made based on public interest and voting.  Will the ICO announcement such as date and so on be posted on this thread, or will it be on another thread on the ANN subforum?  We'll notify users on this thread, Twitter, and through email if you registered at https://wcex.co.  If a friend of mine invites another friend, will I benefit?  No. You'll get credited for the first level of friends you invite (not multi-level).

Author: wcxofficial
Title: [ANN][ICO] WCX – Digital currency exchange built by ex Apple engineers
Body: Thanks for all your replies. We try to address most of the questions that came up below.  Recap of dates and timelines (planned)  - Beta Launch on September 1, 2017 - ICO Start on September 9, 2017 - Launch on October 10, 2017  Questions about ICO, details, team  We'll release more details in the coming days and weeks about this. Regarding the cap, it will be capped. No tokens will be generated beyond the ones sold at the ICO. Any unsold tokens will be burned. The tokens that remain will pay out 20% of the exchange fee revenue regardless of how many there are, so we won't cut back on that either.  How will payouts work?  If you hold WCX tokens, you'll be paid on a weekly basis directly to your WCX wallet. Payment will be made in all types of digital currencies since WCX collects fees in all kinds of cryptocurrencies.  Will you have chat on-site?  Yes.  Where will you legally operate?  Hong Kong and Luxembourg. No US based operations.  Bounties, campaigns, promotions?  More coming up, likely including a BT sig campaign.   Do you have Slack or Reddit?  Not at this time. Likely in a later phase.  You claim to have no KYC, how will you establish fiat payments?  We will not require KYC for any cryptocurrency deposits or withdrawals. When we integrate fiat later in 2018, KYC will be required if you choose to deposit or withdraw fiat - this is required by the banks who hold the fiat, not us in particular.  Exchanges where WCX will be tradable?  WCX tokens will be tradable on WCX itself at launch time. You'll find liquidity to either buy or sell.  When are the promo payouts made?  The payouts for the BT promotion, Twitter, Coin voting, etc. are made at the end of the week. For the current promo, that is Sunday, July 30.  How will you keep people in the loop?  The best way is to sign up at https://wcex.co and also to follow this thread. We will be sending you emails from time to time with important updates.  Is it decentralized?  No. At least not at first - wallet decentralization is on our roadmap. Unfortunately efficient order book exchange decentralization is not consumer ready, but we will be first to hop on board when it is.  Will you be providing trading tools, charting, indicators?  Yes. WCX will have charts and tools to accommodate beginner as well as professional traders.  Can you add LTC?  LTC will be available at launch. We've added a "Other" form field at the coin voting page so you can specify a coin you'd like to trade that isn't listed. https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdkFM1HKmTfhDeJ5Acn5hstJFi_Mcj8KIgMk7fpvOxJ2Ua5aA/viewform  Can you add IOTA, LBC, WAVES, DOGE, STR, BTS, OMNI ... ?  Yes. These coins are likely to be added post launch based on demand. Please reply in this thread concerning coins that you'd like to see added. Please don't send emails or Twitter replies concerning this.  What is the benefit of WCX tokens?  This is described in the "What are WCX tokens?" section here: https://wcex.co.  Can we have promotions that pay in WCX rather than BTC?  You can sign up on https://wcex.co and get 100 WCX right off the bat. You can then invite friends through your referral link to accumulate more WCX tokens at a rate of 200 WCX tokens for each friend you refer.

Author: somacoin
Title: [ANN][ICO] WCX – Digital currency exchange built by ex Apple engineers
Body: Is this a real question, sir? Let me try to answer! The WCX coin is an Ethereum token that runs on the Ethereum blockchain. If you hold it you can earn monthly dividends by the WCX exchange This is how it works in a nutshell. See here: Quote As a holder of WCX tokens, you're entitled to a portion of WCX's fee profit. Since WCX collects fees in all sorts of digital currencies, holding WCX tokens is the equivalent of holding a diversified digital currency portfolio that keeps growing. 20% of all fee revenue generated by WCX is automatically paid out to WCX token holders on a weekly basis, in amounts equivalent to each holder's share of the total amount of tokens. WCX is an ERC20 token issued on the Ethereum blockchain.

Author: FreedomShore
Title: [ANN][ICO] WCX – Digital currency exchange built by ex Apple engineers
Body: Sounds great, eh? Am excited too  this was asked several times and this is what they said so far: Quote from: wcxofficial on July 19, 2017, 04:36:20 PM Quote from: somacoin on July 19, 2017, 08:55:04 AM this sounds promising. i believe a lot in decentralized exchanges but I will also support the good centralized exchanges. i would like to ask more about your team - on the website you state 'Our team comes from Apple, Deutsche Bank, and IBM, and has decades of experience in building secure, distributed, and massive-volume systems.'. Will you publish more information about your team on the site soon? thanks  Thanks. We'll have more information about the team, ICO, and product in the days and weeks to come leading up to 9.9.17, the ICO's start date.  Indeed decentralization is our goal as well, but we don't believe blockchain technology is ready right now to accommodate a truly decentralized, scalable, fast, and secure order book trading platform. We're all for decentralization and will be the first to hop on board when a mass consumer-ready solution exists. Decentralizing WCX customer wallets is on our roadmap.  Quote from: Komorebi on July 19, 2017, 02:12:01 PM I am most interested in the trading engine. You say it has been field tested for years, may I ask where has it been deployed? I would really like to test it! If you are looking for beta testers in the future (can we earn rewards?), please get in touch. I will be available.  Quote from: zuggu-1 on July 19, 2017, 03:12:33 PM waiting for launch & asking if a bounty for early testers for the platform will be launched all the best WCX team   Thanks. We'll be looking for beta testers for our beta launch on 9.1.17 and will keep you posted. Bounties / rewards will be available.    so I guess we'll know more in a few days.  it's the pre alpha time apparently! thanks flying out to @wcxofficial, I received the reward.

Author: wcxofficial
Title: [ANN][ICO] WCX – Digital currency exchange built by ex Apple engineers
Body: We don't plan on sending newsletters any time soon but will keep subscribers in the loop with important updates. Yes, we are looking into running a BT sig campaign.  Quote from: Bambulee on July 22, 2017, 02:54:14 AM hm Ok then i have forgotten my password, is there a change that you can reset?  No worries. PM me the email you used to sign up and we'll get that reset for you.  Quote from: somacoin on July 22, 2017, 01:52:32 PM I'd like to know some more about this point: "Global & Anonymous. Trading's open to people of all countries. No ID checks" - not so much about the ids but other forms of identification. like, will you be logging ip addresses? how do you plan to handle hackers or scammers trying to launder their coins through your exchange? these kinda questions seem very important to me. and lastly, are user's funds held in cold storage? thanks so much for answering all of this.  Security and privacy are fundamental to the design of WCX. Our business model is very straightforward: A great trading experience at very low cost. We don't ask for ID and we don't store IP addresses except in malign cases (a user / users trying to DDOS the service). 98% of customer funds will be stored in cold storage.  Quote from: cryptosecurity on July 20, 2017, 11:48:46 PM Yes! btw really curious! how many people is your exchange supposed to be able to serve at once? If its a global exchange I suppose it may have to support 500000 or more people at the same time easily, right? That's hard to implement well, I think there hasn't been anything of this scope yet  Our trading engine can accommodate around 1 million transactions per second. The UI site itself (outside the API) is built to be scaled to accommodate any number of users.

Author: evergrow
Title: [ANN][ICO] WCX – Digital currency exchange built by ex Apple engineers
Body: 1 million tps is just amazing! Considering that...  "VISA handles on average around 2,000 transactions per second (tps), so call it a daily peak rate of 4,000 tps. It has a peak capacity of around 56,000 transactions per second, however they never actually use more than about a third of this even during peak shopping periods.  PayPal, in contrast, handled around 10 million transactions per day for an average of 115 tps in late 2014."  "Today the Bitcoin network is restricted to a sustained rate of 7 tps due to the bitcoin protocol restricting block sizes to 1MB."  Source: https://en.bitcoin.it/wiki/Scalability  If this is the truth and your exchange can accomodate around 1M transactions per second, it will definitely be the first of a new type of crypto exchange!

Author: instacalm
Title: [ANN][ICO] WCX – Digital currency exchange built by ex Apple engineers
Body: Indeed, being able to buy BTC, ETH, as well as other altcoins and tokens at market rate directly via one's bank is very nice. The German Bitcoin.de exchange, for instance, directly cooperates with Fidor bank (German online bank) to allow direct instant trading of BTC/EUR with other "express trading" users on the Bitcoin.de platform.  It would be nice to see something along the lines of that, i.e. allowing users to deposit funds right from their bank account as quickly as possible. Needless to say -- cooperating with banks, however, is not unproblematic. Of course, not every exchange should necessarily support FIAT or be affiliated with banks. I warmly welcome a solid low fee exchange that only supports BTC and ETH trading pairs. I don't mind if it doesn't support FIAT deposit/withdrawal. If it has a smoothly working fiat implementation: good bonus.

Author: wcxofficial
Title: [ANN][ICO] WCX – Digital currency exchange built by ex Apple engineers
Body: Hi mixan. We're not asking customers to send us their bitcoins. The ICO starts on 9.9.17 where people will be able to buy WCX tokens. The beta version of WCX is set to launch one week before that on 9.1.17, and the full launch is set for 4 weeks after the ICO on 10.10.17.  Contrarily to many recent ICOs and token sales, WCX will have a functional product to show pre-ICO and aiming for good traction and volume by the time the ICO ends.

Title: [ANN][ICO] WCX – Digital currency exchange built by ex Apple engineers
Body: The beta set to launch on 9.1.17 will be a web app that's also viewable and optimized for mobile browsers. Native mobile apps for both iOS and Android are on our roadmap planned for early an 2018 release. Mobile is high priority for us.  Quote from: Bambulee on July 21, 2017, 05:34:26 PM there is a lil bug on https://wcex.co./ It ask me for a password for Sign In, but i never have gave a passwort, i put my e-mail for 2 days and Verify my email address thats all. Also there is no option to reset passwort.  When you enter your email at https://wcex.co, you're prompted to create a password. This allows you to create an account to track your WCX tokens. When you refer someone, tokens are credited to your account when they sign up and verify their email.  Quote from: Komorebi on July 21, 2017, 05:51:25 PM  Sounds great  Also couldn't agree more about having a working product available pre-ICO.  This is a very good way to go. Chances are I'll invest too.  Will you gradually roll out some more info?  Would also love to see more campaigns here on Bitcointalk for us to participate in and earn more WCX tokens.  Could something like this be set up in the future?  Yes - we want to make sure everyone who'd like to invest at the ICO can use the product and make their own judgment about it and the company's potential. It's only fair.  We'll have more info about this coming out in the next days and weeks, including details about the ICO, more promotions, and likely a BitcoinTalk sig campaign.

Author: wcxofficial
Title: [ANN][ICO] WCX – Digital currency exchange built by ex Apple engineers
Body: Thanks. We'll have more information about the team, ICO, and product in the days and weeks to come leading up to 9.9.17, the ICO's start date.  Indeed decentralization is our goal as well, but we don't believe blockchain technology is ready right now to accommodate a truly decentralized, scalable, fast, and secure order book trading platform. We're all for decentralization and will be the first to hop on board when a mass consumer-ready solution exists. Decentralizing WCX customer wallets is on our roadmap.  Quote from: Komorebi on July 19, 2017, 02:12:01 PM I am most interested in the trading engine. You say it has been field tested for years, may I ask where has it been deployed? I would really like to test it! If you are looking for beta testers in the future (can we earn rewards?), please get in touch. I will be available.  Quote from: zuggu-1 on July 19, 2017, 03:12:33 PM waiting for launch & asking if a bounty for early testers for the platform will be launched all the best WCX team    Thanks. We'll be looking for beta testers for our beta launch on 9.1.17 and will keep you posted. Bounties / rewards will be available.

Author: wcxofficial
Title: [ANN][ICO] WCX – Digital currency exchange built by ex Apple engineers
Body: Quote from: jt byte on July 19, 2017, 01:54:52 PM An exchange giving out tokens is a nice way to welcome their potential customers and gets them to be more involved and active in the platform once it is launched.  Great job WCX!  Will be watching when you do finally launch after the summer is over and classes start again.  Thanks. Our north star is total focus on customer satisfaction. Part of that means offering the highest quality service at the lowest fees. Another part of that means finding a way to allow early customers to participate in our future success. Issuing WCX tokens to the public achieves this since owners of WCX tokens earn a portion of the revenue the exchange generates.  One note about WCX tokens is that they'll be tradable on WCX from the start, so that also provides liquidity for early customers who want to sell or new customers who want to buy in.  Quote from: WarrEagle on July 19, 2017, 12:25:23 PM Love the concept of this exchange and it also doesnt hurt to have a cool symbol for a name. It makes it sound like a racing type-r car from Japan.  Thanks!

Author: wcxofficial
Title: [ANN][ICO] WCX – Digital currency exchange built by ex Apple engineers
Body: New: May 22, 2018  Hello Bitcointalk!  We're excited to announce WCX, a new crypto exchange.  Trading derivatives: https://wcex.com Exchange: https://exchange.wcex.com/  I'm Tomas the CTO. Arno who is responsible for community management is also here.  Story We started a presale token sale last July and it grew well beyond our expectations. We had an exchange system prepared capable of supporting about 30K traders, but that turned out to be insufficient given the strong demand (currently over 1.6 million signups).  So we went back to the drawing board and built a scalable digital currency exchange, and that led to the first version of our spot exchange.  About WCX WCX is a digital asset exchange. We have three products: spot exchange, futures exchange, and decentralized exchange.  1) Spot exchange allows you to trade between high market cap currencies like bitcoin, ether, and the USD. 2) Futures exchange (leveraged trading) will launch in Q4 this year. 3) Decentralized exchange will launch in Q1 2019. It's where you can trade digital assets and utility and security tokens directly from your own wallet.  We want to become a place where you can trade and invest in thousands of markets using digital currency.  Our roadmap is laid out on our token sale page here.  Team We are a small team based in France and moving to Switzerland in the next few months (to the crypto valley). Our team is currently 2 founders, 2 engineers, and support and design contractors some of which will convert to full time roles.  We're very technical and product focused (the 2 founders are software engineers from Apple).  Interview with our CEO: listen here.   Please feel free to ask your questions! I'm happy to respond.  I noticed that there are already a few support questions being posted here. You'll have the best luck reaching out to our support team directly. Here's the link: https://wcex.com/support.  ICO Trackers WCX on TrackICO (verified) WCX on ICORanker (verified)  And finally, where you can find us on social media:  Twitter Blog Telegram LinkedIn Github

Author: wcxofficial
Title: [ANN][ICO] WCX – Digital currency exchange built by ex Apple engineers
Body: Thanks jaceefrost, PMed you for Filipino translation.  We're able to provide much lower fees because most of the exchanges out there are overcharging tremendously. The net fee for Bittrex for example is 0.5% per trade. WCX will be under 0.1% and market makers are paid, instead of charged, when they trade.  Current exchanges seem to be run inefficiently and unprofessionally, or mismanaged, which is why we see this as an opportunity to offer a professional, at-cost, client-focused exchange. The fees are too high, or the customer support sucks, or deposits/withdrawals take forever, or the trading engine lags, among other things.  We will have pre-ICO bounties as well as bonuses for early buyers of WCX tokens.

Quote from: dashingriddler on July 18, 2017, 08:01:10 PM Just applied for the promotion for the 1st 40 comments. So I do imagine I am one of them who qualify. Author: bravetheheat
Title: [ANN][ICO] WCX – Digital currency exchange built by ex Apple engineers
Body: Do you have a whitepaper with the terms of your ICO and fund distribution? You also mention an experienced team: could you include more details and proof?

Author: wcxofficial
Title: [ANN][ICO] WCX – Digital currency exchange built by ex Apple engineers
Body: 1. WCX will aim to have the lowest costs and fees of any exchange in the world. This is our driving force. We believe the very low fees as well as our laser focus on customer satisfaction, will drive a large amount of volume and liquidity which will benefit the business. Current cryptocurrency exchanges are tremendously overcharging while also mismanaging their business or running it inefficiently.  2. Base markets to start with are BTC, ETH, and USDT. You can vote for which coins and market pairs you want to see included here: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdkFM1HKmTfhDeJ5Acn5hstJFi_Mcj8KIgMk7fpvOxJ2Ua5aA/viewform - you can also let us know if there are particular coins you'd like to trade by replying in this thread.  3. The taker will pay a small fee (e.g. -0.15%) and the maker will get paid, not charged, a fee (e.g. +0.05%). Currently Poloniex nets around 0.4% and Bittrex around 0.5% of every transaction, which are respectively 400% and 500% higher than what WCX intends to charge.

Author: wcxofficial
Title: [ANN][ICO] WCX – Digital currency exchange built by ex Apple engineers
Body: The whitepaper, pitch deck, and more details about the ICO / token distribution and team will be released over the next few days and weeks. A rough estimate for token distribution would be 2% in ICO bonuses, 10% for the team, advisors, founders, and 88% in token distribution to the public.
